logs.message: Parameters: {"nodeType":"nodes-base.googleCalendar","config":{"resource":"event","operation":"create","calendar":"={{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.owner_id.email }}","summary":"Kickoff Meeting - {{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.title }}","description":"Kickoff meeting for new client: {{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.title }}. Deal value: {{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.value }} {{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.currency }}","start":"={{ $now.plus(3, 'days').set({ hour: 10, minute: 0, second: 0, millisecond: 0 }).toISO() }}","end":"={{ $now.plus(3, 'days').set({ hour: 11, minute: 0, second: 0, millisecond: 0 }).toISO() }}","attendees":"={{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.person_id.email }}"}}

Parameters: {"nodeType":"nodes-base.googleDrive","config":{"authentication":"oAuth2","resource":"folder","operation":"share","folderNoRootId":{"mode":"id","value":"={{ $('Google Drive1').item.json.id }}"},"permissions":{"permission":[{"role":"reader","type":"user","emailAddress":"={{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.person_id.email[0].value }}"}]},"sendNotificationEmail":true,"emailMessage":"Hi! Your onboarding documents are now available in this shared folder. Please review them before our kickoff meeting."}}

state.userPrompt: Generate an n8n workflow that: 1) triggers when a deal is marked ‘Closed Won’ in Pipedrive, 2) creates a Google Drive client folder, 3) sends a pre-filled DocuSign contract, 4) shares onboarding docs, 5) books a kickoff meeting in Google Calendar, and 6) notifies the team in Slack.

discovered.purpose: Send a message to Slack channel
Triggers workflow when deals are marked 'Closed Won' in Pipedrive
Creates client folders in Google Drive
Books kickoff meetings in Google Calendar
Shares onboarding documents via Google Drive

workflow.name: Pipedrive Deal Won - Client Onboarding Automation

parameters.description: Client onboarding kickoff meeting for {{ $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.current.title }}

buildPhases.description: Workflow initiates when a deal status changes to 'Closed Won' in Pipedrive, capturing deal and client information for downstream processing.
Creates a dedicated client folder in Google Drive using the deal title, establishing a centralized location for all client-related documents and resources.
Parallel execution of client onboarding tasks: sharing onboarding documents via Google Drive permissions and scheduling a kickoff meeting in Google Calendar with the client.
Sends a comprehensive Slack notification to the sales team with deal details, completion status of onboarding tasks, and next steps for client engagement.

workflow.name: Pipedrive Deal Won - Client Onboarding Automation

parameters.description: ={{ 'Client onboarding kickoff meeting for ' + $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.current.title }}

parameters.content:
## 📥 Triggers
Workflow initiates when a deal status changes to 'Closed Won' in Pipedrive, capturing deal and client information for downstream processing.

## 💾 Storage
Creates a dedicated client folder in Google Drive using the deal title, establishing a centralized location for all client-related documents and resources.

## 🔗 Integration
Parallel execution of client onboarding tasks: sharing onboarding documents via Google Drive permissions and scheduling a kickoff meeting in Google Calendar with the client.

## 🚀 Outputs
Sends a comprehensive Slack notification to the sales team with deal details, completion status of onboarding tasks, and next steps for client engagement.

## 🚀 Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with 💚 by Ghost Team.

Creates a dedicated client folder in Google Drive using the deal title, establishing a centralized location for all client-related documents and resources.
Parallel execution of client onboarding tasks: sharing onboarding documents via Google Drive permissions and scheduling a kickoff meeting in Google Calendar with the client.
Sends a comprehensive Slack notification to the sales team with deal details, completion status of onboarding tasks, and next steps for client engagement.

phases.description: Workflow initiates when a deal status changes to 'Closed Won' in Pipedrive, capturing deal and client information for downstream processing.
Creates a dedicated client folder in Google Drive using the deal title, establishing a centralized location for all client-related documents and resources.
Parallel execution of client onboarding tasks: sharing onboarding documents via Google Drive permissions and scheduling a kickoff meeting in Google Calendar with the client.
Sends a comprehensive Slack notification to the sales team with deal details, completion status of onboarding tasks, and next steps for client engagement.

workflow.name: Pipedrive Deal Won - Client Onboarding Automation

parameters.description: ={{ 'Client onboarding kickoff meeting for ' + $('Pipedrive Trigger').item.json.current.title }}

parameters.content:
## 📥 Triggers
Workflow initiates when a deal status changes to 'Closed Won' in Pipedrive, capturing deal and client information for downstream processing.

## 💾 Storage
Creates a dedicated client folder in Google Drive using the deal title, establishing a centralized location for all client-related documents and resources.

## 🔗 Integration
Parallel execution of client onboarding tasks: sharing onboarding documents via Google Drive permissions and scheduling a kickoff meeting in Google Calendar with the client.

## 🚀 Outputs
Sends a comprehensive Slack notification to the sales team with deal details, completion status of onboarding tasks, and next steps for client engagement.

## 🚀 Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with 💚 by Ghost Team.
